title: Is Jungkook the star of BTS? - Quora

response.answer_text: (I’m tired of all these shitty questions, but here we go)😒 How much members are in BTS? Last time I checked there was 7, not one. They work all of their asses off, but no one can see that. Doesn't mean Jungkook is the main vocalist does not mean he is the star of the show (questions like these literally break up bands). Don’t get me wrong he is talented but so are all of them. I don’t know where you gotten the idea that JK is “the star” but I’m shutting that down. Like what if your in a band and some idiot asks if one of the member is the star. I don’t no where your from, but that is called being offensive. So chill the hell out with these questions. So Jungkook is not the star. (Do you ever wonder maybe BTS will read this question) ~Elise ✌
